channel.title: AdzScape V1
channel.description:
Hey guys this is my first server and first time at coding so please go a little easy on me :) Well i have been working on this for a week or so now and hosted it for a little while myself. Since then i have decided to make a download for it... here it is.
New Home New Training Area at Mage bank hexagon New Skills at Catherby Portals Area
Commands: (:: before every command EG: ::home) [font="Arial"][i]::smith ::slayer, ::wc, ::mining, ::shops ::train, ::skill, ::empty, ::home, ::starter ::suggest, ::jad, ::drags, ::crabs, ::kq, ::cwars ::barrows, ::pkbox, ::edge, ::guilds ::mypk, ::cather, ::3rdage, ::teampk ::pure, ::notedbarrows, ::staffzone, ::xteleto ::sweet, ::food, ::modwear, ::mute, ::unmute ::pnpc, ::pickup, ::xteletome, ::god, ::godoff ::master, ::ban, ::unban ::alert, ::lupdate, ::givemem, ::givemod, ::giveadmin ::giveowner, ::alltome, ::owner, ::ipban, ::demote, ::ownerglow[/i] [/font]
Credits:
20% to Allstar for V2 Base. 50% to Random Tutorials to teach me :) 30% to me for coding.
If you have any problems with Credits please say i can change.
Pictures Home [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2m2jqyf.jpg[/img]
Starter Gear [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1z6f7s5.jpg[/img]
Shops--Just South from home. [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2qlesr8.jpg[/img]
Emote Tabs [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/dbkr5d.jpg[/img]
Training Area [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2zg8zfa.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2nth3bd.jpg[/img]
Skills Area [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/6hp6r6.jpg[/img]
Portals [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2nlwxno.jpg[/img]
Download Link- [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?htznwimj0mu]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?htznwimj0mu[/url] [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=PYVWOWBX]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=PYVWOWBX[/url]
Video- http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L-TdAFzAV2I
Thanks Jaffa
PS: Anyone think I should make a V2?

quality vs. quantity. Remember that mscpers.

Hey guys this is my first server and first time at coding so please go a little easy on me
